translationEn: You can’t call yogurt what’s just milk.
meaning: Things are what they are; you can't fake them.
One small sign doesn’t mean a major change has come.

textDari: هر کی به فکر خویش، کوسه به فکر ریش.
textPashto: هر څوک د ځان غم خوري، کوسه د ږیرې.
translationEn: Everyone thinks of themselves, even the shark of its beard.
meaning: People mostly care about their own interests.

textDari: آب از سر گذشت چه یک گز چه صد گز.
textPashto: اوبه چې تر غاړې تیرې شوې، نو که یوه ګزه وي که سوه.
translationEn: Once water passes your head, it doesn’t matter how deep it is.
meaning: When you're overwhelmed, the degree no longer matters.

textPashto: بې له زحمه خزانه نه ترلاسه کېږي.
meaning: Success requires effort and hard work.

textPashto: د ګاونډي چرګ غوز ګڼل کېږي.
translationEn: The neighbor’s chicken looks like a goose.
meaning: Others' things often seem better than our own.

textPashto: لوی کاڼی د نه ویشتلو نښه ده.
translationEn: A big stone is a sign that it won’t be thrown.
meaning: When a task seems too ambitious, it probably won’t get done.

textDari: دیگ به دیگ می‌گوید رویت سیاه.
textPashto: یو دیګ بل دیګ ته وايي چې مخ دې تور دی.
translationEn: The pot tells the other pot: your face is black.
meaning: People criticize others for faults they themselves have.

translationEn: Neither the skewer burns, nor the kebab.
meaning: Trying to keep both sides happy.
Teamwork is necessary to make an impact.
